about_the_game:
THE NEW FANTASY CREATURE COLLECTING GARDENING GAME!


Cultivate an exotic, bioxotic homestead - Bioxotica! Grow a ranch of peculiar plants and collectible creatures. Create structures and grand habitats. Will you discover the secrets of this wild land and create a flourishing settlement for the inhabitants on this exotic frontier?

• Customize the environment to fit the needs of each creature that calls your land home!

• Attract and develop different magical and fantasy creatures!

• Help the Bioxotica Venture rebuild after a world altering apocalypse.
detailed_description:
THE NEW FANTASY CREATURE COLLECTING GARDENING GAME!


Cultivate an exotic, bioxotic homestead - Bioxotica! Grow a ranch of peculiar plants and collectible creatures. Create structures and grand habitats. Will you discover the secrets of this wild land and create a flourishing settlement for the inhabitants on this exotic frontier?

• Customize the environment to fit the needs of each creature that calls your land home!

• Attract and develop different magical and fantasy creatures!

• Help the Bioxotica Venture rebuild after a world altering apocalypse.

name: Bioxotica

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.1 GHz / AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz / equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 650TI / AMD R7 250x
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only operates on 64 bit systems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 @ 3.4 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3.2 GHz / equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only operates on 64 bit systems
